text.section: The Kentucky Milk Commission established under KRS 260.662 shall have no authority to promulgate administrative regulations to establish pricing on milk or milk products.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 67, sec. 5, effective June 25, 2009.
